member.name: D3D11_QUERY_DATA_SO_STATISTICS
member.summary: Query information about the amount of data streamed out to the stream-output buffers in between and .

member.name: D3D11_QUERY_DATA_SO_STATISTICS.NumPrimitivesWritten
member.summary: Number of primitives (that is, points, lines, and triangles) written to the stream-output buffers.

member.name: D3D11_QUERY_DATA_SO_STATISTICS.PrimitivesStorageNeeded
member.summary: Number of primitives that would have been written to the stream-output buffers if there had been enough space for them all.
